Copying from the pdf removed line breaks (it would have been fine had I copied from the html -- anyway...). Reintroduce:

```{r}
dat <- read.table(text = raw_dat, sep = " ") |>
  t() |>
  as.vector() |>
  matrix(ncol = 5, byrow = TRUE) |>
  as_tibble() |>
  rename(name = V1, masc.mean = V2, masc.SD = V3, pos.mean = V4, pos.SD = V5) |>
  mutate(across(masc.mean:pos.SD, as.numeric))
dat
```


Ordered by how non-binary the names are:

```{r}
dat |> mutate(binary = abs(masc.mean - 3)) |>
  arrange(binary)
```
